trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.EditingControlShowing> event to perform custom initialization of the editing control when a cell enters edit mode.

To customize the display characteristics of the control, set the properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A> property rather than setting the properties of the control returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A> property.
For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs"></xref> class.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> in which the user will edit the selected cell's contents.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> representing the style of the cell being edited.
Gets or sets the cell style of the edited cell.

To customize the display characteristics of the control, set the properties of the object returned by the CellStyle property rather than setting the properties of the control returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.Control%2A> property.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> representing the style of the cell being edited.
The specified value when setting this property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
The control shown to the user for editing the selected cell's value.

To customize the display characteristics of the control, set the properties of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewEditingControlShowingEventArgs.CellStyle%2A> property rather than setting the properties of the control returned by the Control property.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> that displays an area for the user to enter or change the selected cell's value.
